entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
